data.description: Are you ready to turn your classroom knowledge into real-world experience?Do you enjoy collaborating with others and working as part of a team? If so, the Federal Home Loan Bank of Indianapolis (FHLBank) invites you to apply for our 2026 Summer Internship Program!We’re looking for well-rounded, motivated students to join us for a 10-week paid internship where you’ll gain hands-on experience, build your professional network, and develop valuable skills in a dynamic business environment.What You’ll ExperienceAs a Business Intelligence Intern at FHLBank, you’ll:Analyze large datasets to identify trends and generate actionable insights for strategic decision-making and operational improvementsDevelop and maintain reports and dashboards using tools like Power BI to communicate findings to stakeholdersUtilize SQL and data visualization techniques to support data-driven initiativesApply strong problem-solving and communication skills to collaborate across teams and present analytical results effectivelyContribute to meaningful projects that align with your field of studyGain exposure to the finance and banking industryParticipate in team-building activities, a group project, a community service event, and professional development sessions (including dining etiquette!)Who We’re Looking ForWe’re seeking students who:Have completed at least their sophomore year of undergraduate studiesAre majoring in Finance, Data Analytics, Business Analytics or Data ScienceCommunicate effectively, both in writing and verballyWork well independently and in team settingsAre detail-oriented, organized, and eager to solve problemsProgram Highlights10-week paid internship: Monday, June 1 to Friday, August 7Flexible hybrid workforce model: Onsite three days a week and two days remote.Competitive hourly rate“Dress for your day” dress code: You choose the appropriate work attire based on what your day looks like.Professional development and networking opportunitiesInclusive and collaborative work environmentReady to apply? Submit your resume and cover letter. We look forward to learning more about you!The Federal Home Loan Bank of Indianapolis is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
